middle-of-the-road.translation[0].defini: middle-of-the-road ideas or opinions are not extreme, and so most people are likely to agree with them
a party offering safe, middle-of-the-road policies
middle-of-the-road voters or politicians have ideas that are not extreme
ordinary and not new, different, or exciting
Their first album was quite good, but the second was very middle-of-the-road stuff.
